>
[Haphazard Repair](/Feats.aspx?ID=3046) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
<trait label="Unstable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=416" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 25 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You quickly fix your innovation, at the cost of its stability. You [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) your innovation almost immediately. You don't have to place the innovation on a flat surface, but you do need to be adjacent to it (including holding or wearing it), as well as having a [repair kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=43) as normal.
name: Haphazard Repair
